Text: Kingdom Hearts: Chain of Memories (Japanese: キングダム ハーツ チェイン オブ メモリーズ , Hepburn: Kingudamu Hātsu Chein Obu Memorīzu ) is an action role-playing game developed by Jupiter and published by Square Enix in 2004 for the Game Boy Advance.
